name: Synt(h)ax Error
description:
Use the power of music, to avoid dangers and obstacles, and become the DJ of the party!

This is a school project made by a team of 12 game developer-students at The Game Assembly, Stockholm, as our 1st project. The game was made with the Unity engine over the time of 6 weeks, half-time.

Mouse, Keyboard optional

Navigate menus with a mouse.

Jump using space or left mouse button.

The Game Assembly is a Higher Vocational Education located in Stockholm and Malmö in Sweden. We educate game developers!

The Game Assembly’s curriculum’s in Game art, Leveldesign, Technical art, Game programming and Game Animation is written by the Swedish games industry and we continously have a dialogue about how to be in the frontier of game production.

Parallel with individual courses throughout the education our students are assigned to groups and together they create 8 games of various types, some of which you will be able to find on this page.

Is gaming and game development your passion? Are you interested in reading more about The Game Assembly and how to apply?

Please read more on our homepage: https://www.thegameassembly.com/
